Source.Name: busybox
Source.Summary: Statically linked binary providing simplified versions of system commands
Source.Description: busybox is a single binary which includes versions of a large number of system commands, including a shell.

Package.Name: busybox
Package.Summary: Statically linked binary providing simplified versions of system commands
Package.Description: busybox is a single binary which includes versions of a large number of system commands, including a shell.
